titles.title: Federal None of the Above Act of 1995
To permit voters to vote for "None of the Above" in elections for Federal office and to require an additional election if "None of the Above" receives the most votes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H7687)
Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H8166-8169)

bill.summary: 07/26/1995--Introduced. Federal None of the Above Act of 1995 - Requires: (1) placement of "none of the above" on Federal election ballots; and (2) an additional election within a specified time if "none of the above" receives the most votes.
